### Marine Ecosystem Dynamics


#### September 2025

On this website, material for the introduction to R are made available.

In the [MATERIAL](MATERIAL/index.qmd){.button} tab, slides and exercises can be found.

----


During this introduction, we will learn how to use ![](./assets/images/Rlogo.svg){height=1.5em style=margin-bottom;} in ![](./assets/images/RSTUDIO.png){height=1.5em style=margin-bottom;} to handle data.

Install [R](https://www.r-project.org/){target="_blank"} and [R studio](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/){target="_blank"} before the start of the lecture !

### Day 2
- Pipe the data using [`magrittr`](https://magrittr.tidyverse.org/){target="_blank"}
- Tidy the data using [`tidyr`](https://tidyr.tidyverse.org/){target="_blank"}
- Arrange the data using [`dplyr`](https://dplyr.tidyverse.org/){target="_blank"}
- Visualise the data using [`ggplot2`](https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org/){target="_blank"}
:::
:::

The data we will use are all available in the package [`PlanktonData`](https://kmgjan.github.io/PlanktonData/){target="_blank"}
